name: pnp-list-formatting-custom-charts
title: Custom Charts
shortDescription: This templates package will allow you to quickly create 7 different types of charts, which you can organize into collections, share, and publish on SharePoint pages.
longDescription: This templates package will allow you to quickly create 7 different types of charts, which you can organize into collections, share, and publish on SharePoint pages.

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
